text: Good Morning! How are you doing today?
Morning, I am good how about yourself?
Oh I'm doing well, thank you very much. I wanted to ask you, have you heard about the charity Save The Children?
No, I haven't what is it they do?
It is an international non-governmental organisation that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries
That sounds like a great thing they do

Some of their most recent deeds include helping Rohingya Refugees and are still on the ground helping refugees  in Texas after the hurricanes. They are such a great charity that really puts their money towards their cause
Those are great causes the children are who need the most help I think besides animals anyway
Do you think this is something you could see yourself donating to?
yes, I would donate what I could may not be much but every cent helps right?
Absolutely! I completely agree, I mean, we Turk for a reason right?! If the donation was to come out of your current earnings for this task, how much would you be willing to donate?
I'm sorry if it doesn't sound like much but I could donate 0.05 I'm trying to save for my cats surgery
I'm so sorry to hear about your cat. I completely understand, I'm having a root canal done today, that will put me back at least $1100. Yay. But $.05 is great
you know you say 5 cents and feel a need to explain.... I wish I could do more really I feel so horrible for all the people who have lost everything in the recent natural disasters
If you could donate more, do you think this is a worthy cause to do so with?
I think it is well, if what they say is true and it all goes to kids ( you never know now days) kids are our future
Is there anything specific you'd want your donation to go towards?

If I had my choice I would start with donating towards the natural disasters like in Texas and then to education for kids, and well, food and a safe place to live, and then to other countries because you can't help other countries if your own nation is falling apart all by itself
In an ideal world, where we had all the monies, how much would you be willing to donate to a cause like this?

In an ideal world, I would do better then donate I would help the people myself, I would go there and help them rebuild, or bring the supplies, or find them shelter..... if we had no concern about limited money I would give everything they needed.
